mapper.select: SELECT #{id} as NOTI_ID , LPAD(A.Code,'4','0') as licnsCd , B.LicenseName as licnsNm , A.Category as licnsCtgyNm , 0 as licnsGroup , IF(B.Part = 0 , IF(Gubun = 1 , '0' ,IF(Gubun = 2 , '1', '2')) , IF(B.Part = 1, '3', '4') ) as licnsDstnctCd FROM NoticeTables.S_NoticeLicense AS A, HashTables.LicenseInfo AS B WHERE A.NoticePart = B.Part AND A.Code = B.Code AND A.KeyBaseTable = #{prfId}
